metadata.title: CVE-2021-34813 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Matrix libolm before 3.2.3 allows a malicious Matrix homeserver to crash aclient (while it is attempting to retrieve an Olm encrypted room key backupfrom the homeserver) because olm_pk_decrypt has a stack-based bufferoverflow. Remote code execution might be possible for some nonstandardbuild configurations.

criterions.comment: olm package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
